ModMetaData.name: Powerful Psycast AI
ModMetaData.author: NilchEi
ModMetaData.description: Gives NPC AI ability to cast: Berserk Pulse, Manhunter Pulse, Berserk, Vertigo Pulse, Waterskip, Invisibility, Beckon, Blinding Pulse, Wallraise, Smokepop, Painblock, Focus, Mass Chaos Skip, Stun, Chaos Skip, Skip, Burden and allows Neolithic and Ultra (Empire) tech level factions to generate Psycasters. Specifics can be adjusted from the mod settings.
